title: NVIDIA GENAI Developer Contest (Received Honorable Mention)
description: For NVIDIA's Generative AI developer contest, I created a project called Persona, which placed me among the top 10 projects for the contest. Peronsa integrates Large-Language-Models into Unreal Engine, to power dynamic and immersive dialogues for characters in video games.
